name: Bitcoin Green
description: Bitcoin Green is a proof-of-stake, transactional currency designed to provide a scalable and sustainable alternative to Bitcoin. Bitcoin Green (BITG) is founded on 'The Green Protocol,' which utilizes a highly efficient proof-of-stake consensus algorithm that solves many of Bitcoinâ€™s sustainability and scalability problems. Furthermore, Bitcoin Green can be mined on any computer or laptop without specialized equipment.
